project_abstract.cdata: The overall objective of the Technical Assistance Project is to assist Cambodia's transition to a market economy by helping to implement the Government's economic reform program.  This will be done, first, by strengthening the economic mamangement team and, second, by helping put in place the foundations for an environment conducive to private sector development.  To achieve those objectives, IDA Credit financing will be made available to mobilize consultants' services, prepare and implement training programs, and provide equipment and works in support of the Government's policies to be carried out in the following areas: 1) public expenditure control; 2) public investment management; 3) foreign debt management; 4) public sector personnel management; and 5) private sector development.
